meaningMnemonic: The <radical>tree</radical> has an <radical>omen</radical> growing from it, one single <kanji>peach</kanji> that is the size of a house. Inside is a child who will save the village from demons.
readingMnemonic: If <reading>momo</reading>taro (もも) wasn't enough, think about the <kanji>peach</kanji> growing larger and larger. You want it to grow bigger, so you yell at it: "<reading>MO</reading>RE! <reading>MO</reading>RE!" (もも).
